nodes.bodyText:
Can we consider renaming the class name OIDProviderResponseBuilder?
OIDCProviderDiscoveryResponseBuilder or OpenIDConnectProviderDiscoveryResponseBuilder
or something along the lines that would give the purpose of the extension or interface.
For backward compatibility we will keep the name as it is. We will improve the Java Docs of this interface to convey the actual purpose of the interface.
Can we do a comparison with the spec and see if there are other missing ones we can support OOTB?
